Subject: Save the Date: Company Summer Picnic
Paragraphs:
Dear All,

We are excited to announce that the company summer picnic will be held on Saturday, July 24th at the local park. Join us for an afternoon of food, drinks, and games with your colleagues and their families. Please see the attached flyer for more details and RSVP by Monday, July 12th if you plan to attend.

Tom is not invited.

Best regards,
Events Committee
